LanguageData.AlertMechanoidThreatDesc: A mechhive is conducting scans to determine your location. It will send a massive raid of hostile mechanoids when it locates you.\n\nFlee the map before mechanoids arrive!
LanguageData.AlertMechanoidThreatCriticalDesc: A mechhive has discovered your location. It will continue to send hostile mechanoids until you flee this location.
LanguageData.StabilizersRemainingAlertDescription: The cerebrex core is currently invulnerable. Find and destroy its stabilizers to gain access to the core.
LanguageData.RelayStabilizersRemainingAlertDescriptio: The relay is currently protected by nearby stabilizers. Destroy or hack them to destabilize it.
LanguageData.SurveyScannerAlertDescription: Protect the scanner until the surveying operation is complete.
